description:
I can add tracks and specify a Piano, but I can't figure out how to add music to those tracks, so this program is useless to me for composing music.

Also, while this program is running, a high pitched squealing sound gradually gets louder and I have to plug my ears to avoid hearing damage. I got the volume turned down, but I have no idea why this program does this -- none of the other do.

I'm uninstalling this program because it's useless for composing music, and because the high-pitched squealing sound it makes will probably damage my hearing.
summary: Can't compose music, and makes dangerous high-pitched squealing sound

description: I really appreciate what the main developer has done. This is specifically not a DAW, as specified on the website, but it is an excellent tools that does what it says, and is more than enough for a lot of people looking into music production. I have used to compose many tracks and will continue to use it in the future.
Good to make beats. I have use this only for making drum loops and beats.
Залупа!! Мало того, что кривой код, так еще и удалить не выходит...
